name: UpdateFreshserviceRelease
description:
Update an existing Release in Freshservice.

Use this tool to modify details of an existing release in Freshservice. This is useful for updating information such as release dates, descriptions, or status.

parameters.name: release_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the release to update in Freshservice.

parameters.name: release_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the release to be updated, including fields like subject, status, planned start date, etc.

agent_id.description: Unique identifier of the agent to whom the Release is assigned

group_id.description: Unique identifier of the agent group to which the Release is assigned

status.description: Status identifier of the Release. Open -> 1, On hold -> 2, In Progress -> 3, Incomplete -> 4, Completed -> 5

planned_start_date.description: Timestamp at which release is starting

planned_end_date.description: Timestamp at which release is ending

work_start_date.description: Timestamp at which release work started

work_end_date.description: Timestamp at which release work ended

department_id.description: Unique ID of the department initiating the Release

created_at.description: Timestamp at which Release was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which Release was last updated

associated_assets.description: Unique IDs of the assets associated with the Release request

display_id.description: display id of the asset that is used for all operations

usage_type.description: Usage type of the asset  (accepted values are 'permanent' & 'loaner')

group_id.description: Managed by group of the asset

assigned_on.description: Date and time when the asset was assigned

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the asset was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the asset was last modified

type_fields.description: Fields specific to every asset type (Every asset will have default base fields and type specific fields)

associated_changes.description: Unique IDs of the Changes associated with the Release

custom_fields.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields

description_text.description: Reason for change in plain text format
Rollout plan in plain text format
Backout plan in plain text format

value_schema.description: Release details that needs to be updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
